abstracts.cdata!:
The Nairobi Sites and Services Project
            will provide 6,000 serviced lots for self-help housing,
            together with related on-site infrastructure and community
            facilities; finance for materials loans to enable allottees
            to construct self-help dwellings on their lots; trunk
            sewerage to serve the project site and other areas in
            Nairobi, and technical assistance comprising: the
            operational costs of a new NCC Department set up to
            implement the project; studies of (a) Nairobi City
            Council's housing operations and ways to improve them,
            (b) preparation of future site and service and squatter
            upgrading projects in Nairobi and other cities; and (c)
            municipal finance in Kenya; (d) design and engineering
            works; (e) project monitoring and evaluation; and (f) a
            pilot study of nutrition needs in Nairobi.
